thread.title: Trump reportedly went 'ballistic' over Sessions recusal amid Russia firestorm
thread.title_full: Trump reportedly went 'ballistic' over Sessions recusal amid Russia firestorm

author: Michelle Mark
title: Trump reportedly went 'ballistic' over Sessions recusal amid Russia firestorm
text:
President Donald Trump was outraged Friday over Attorney General Jeff Sessions' recusal from investigations into Russian interference in the 2016 campaign, according to media reports.
Tweet Embed:
https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/838033859761618947
Trump left WH in a fury on Friday, fuming about Sessions's recusal and telling aides that Sessions shouldn't have recused himself...Tweet Embed:
https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/838034203711242240
President remarked to staff that Sessions/WH/DOJ should have done more to counter Sessions story, that it was "bull," per aides familiarTweet Embed:
https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/838109346567421952
A source close to Trump told me Friday, re POTUS mindset before Florida flight, "He's in a very [expletive] bad mood today. He is a bear." Read more...
